data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wTtuOumz6SUQ7kNvgG_vPv4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBDXJ0Ll20xj_iU8TKpy-b_MYGgnGpYzln9SqnpBNoVKA&oe=66853437)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=cBy2pDa5eWcQ7kNvgEFGk9w&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDZJLFwDwccDM7rmSBhoaPFwDUbP0m-18eA5p2lLAcZ6A&oe=668541D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bx5VbVmmPwYQ7kNvgFnW4al&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAzhpqqqH6LEwcnd9h9vVJaT6SYHRDC5qZX6udM4r9Mbg&oe=66852D09)
